00017 #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00018 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/MdPairPotential.h>
00019 #include <mcMd/potentials/pair/McPairPotential.h>
00020 #endif

00022 namespace McMd
00023 {
00024 
00025    using namespace Util;
00026 
00027    /*
00028    * Constructor
00029    */
00030    HybridMdMove::HybridMdMove(McSystem& system) :
00031       SystemMove(system),
00032       mdSystemPtr_(0),
00033       nStep_(0)
00034    {
00035       mdSystemPtr_ = new MdSystem(system);
00036       oldPositions_.allocate(simulation().atomCapacity());
00037    }
00038 
00039    /*
00040    * Destructor.
00041    */
00042    HybridMdMove::~HybridMdMove()
00043    {
00044       if (mdSystemPtr_) {
00045          delete mdSystemPtr_;
00046       }
00047    }
00048 
00049    /*
00050    * Read parameter maxDisp
00051    */
00052    void HybridMdMove::readParam(std::istream& in)
00053    {
00054       readProbability(in);
00055       read<int>(in, "nStep", nStep_);
00056       readParamComposite(in, *mdSystemPtr_);
00057    }
00058 
00059    /*
00060    * Generate, attempt and accept or reject a Hybrid MD/MC move.
00061    */
00062    bool HybridMdMove::move()
00063    {
00064       System::MoleculeIterator molIter;
00065       Molecule::AtomIterator   atomIter;
00066       double oldEnergy, newEnergy;
00067       int    iSpec;
00068       int    nSpec = simulation().nSpecies();
00069 
00070       bool   accept;
00071 
00072       // Increment counter for attempted moves
00073       incrementNAttempt();
00074 
00075       // Store old atom positions in oldPositions_ array.
00076       for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < nSpec; ++iSpec) {
00077          mdSystemPtr_->begin(iSpec, molIter);
00078          for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00079             for (molIter->begin(atomIter); atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00080                oldPositions_[atomIter->id()] = atomIter->position();
00081             }
00082          }
00083       }
00084 
00085       // Initialize MdSystem
00086       #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00087       mdSystemPtr_->pairPotential().buildPairList();
00088       #endif
00089       mdSystemPtr_->calculateForces();
00090       mdSystemPtr_->setBoltzmannVelocities(energyEnsemble().temperature());
00091       mdSystemPtr_->mdIntegrator().setup();
00092 
00093       // Store old energy
00094       oldEnergy  = mdSystemPtr_->potentialEnergy();
00095       oldEnergy += mdSystemPtr_->kineticEnergy();
00096 
00097       // Run a short MD simulation
00098       for (int iStep = 0; iStep < nStep_; ++iStep) {
00099          mdSystemPtr_->mdIntegrator().step();
00100       }
00101 
00102       // Calculate new energy
00103       newEnergy  = mdSystemPtr_->potentialEnergy();
00104       newEnergy += mdSystemPtr_->kineticEnergy();
00105 
00106       // Decide whether to accept or reject
00107       accept = random().metropolis( boltzmann(newEnergy-oldEnergy) );
00108 
00109       // Accept move
00110       if (accept) {
00111 
00112          #ifndef INTER_NOPAIR
00113          // Rebuild the McSystem cellList using the new positions.
00114          system().pairPotential().buildCellList();
00115          #endif
00116 
00117          // Increment counter for the number of accepted moves.
00118          incrementNAccept();
00119 
00120       } else {
00121 
00122          // Restore old atom positions
00123          for (iSpec = 0; iSpec < nSpec; ++iSpec) {
00124             mdSystemPtr_->begin(iSpec, molIter);
00125             for ( ; molIter.notEnd(); ++molIter) {
00126                molIter->begin(atomIter);
00127                for ( ; atomIter.notEnd(); ++atomIter) {
00128                   atomIter->position() = oldPositions_[atomIter->id()];
00129                }
00130             }
00131          }
00132 
00133       }
00134 
00135       return accept;
00136 
00137    }
00138 
00139 }
